thread.title: Wilson releases Detroit-themed 'Right to Rise' video
thread.title_full: Wilson releases Detroit-themed 'Right to Rise' video

title: Wilson releases Detroit-themed 'Right to Rise' video
text:
Wilson releases Detroit-themed 'Right to Rise' video The Detroit band has a gritty hometown video to accompany the title track from its latest album. Post to Facebook Wilson releases Detroit-themed 'Right to Rise' video The Detroit band has a gritty hometown video to accompany the title track from its latest album. Check out this story on Freep.com: http://on.freep.com/1RSCn69 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 1 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Wilson releases Detroit-themed 'Right to Rise' video By Brian McCollum, Detroit Free Press Pop Music Critic 3:59 p.m. EDT October 19, 2015 Detroit band Wilson will play an album-release show Saturday at the Crofoot. (Photo: Joe Gall) 3 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Familiar Detroit landmarks and scenes from off the beaten path dominate the new video from Detroit rock band Wilson. 
"Right to Rise" is the title track from the group's sophomore album, which was released in June by Razor & Tie. 
Vocalist Chad Nicefield, who co-directed the new clip, said in a statement that the video is a "picture of hope and growth through hard work, resilience and ingenuity, while honoring our past as we rise towards our future." 
"What weâ€™ve tried to achieve visually is to tell a story thru the (point of view) of a pack of dogs moving thru the blight of our city; the places most identifiable to the rest of the world," Nicefield wrote. "The abandoned house the band is performing in starts to crumble as the 'underdogs' move from the rubble of our past into the present parts of Detroit's rebuild, showing our people coming together in strength to unite as one." 
Wilson is scheduled to play the Royal Oak Music Theatre on Nov. 21. 
(Can't see the video? Click here: http://vevo.ly/O1Gxeg ) <!--iframe--> Read or Share this story: http://on.freep.com/1RSCn69 MORE STORIES
